mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADMIN
WHERE ${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT A.NO ,PER.NAME AS PERMISSION ,PO.NAME AS POSITION ,A.ID ,A.PWD ,A.NICK ,A.NAME ,A.PHONE ,A.ENROLL_DATE ,A.MODIFY_DATE ,DECODE(QUIT_YN, 'N','유지', 'Y','탈퇴') AS QUIT_YN FROM ADMIN A JOIN ADMIN_PERMISSION PER ON A.PERMISSION = PER.NO JOIN ADMIN_POSITION PO ON A.POSITION = PO.NO
WHERE A.${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
ORDER BY A.ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT NO ,PERMISSION ,POSITION ,ID ,NICK ,NAME ,PHONE ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,QUIT_YN ,PROFILE_NAME FROM ADMIN WHERE NO = #{no}

SELECT A.NO ,PER.NAME AS PERMISSION ,PO.NAME AS POSITION ,A.ID ,A.PWD ,A.NICK ,A.NAME ,A.PHONE ,A.ENROLL_DATE ,A.MODIFY_DATE ,A.QUIT_YN ,A.PROFILE_NAME FROM ADMIN A JOIN ADMIN_PERMISSION PER ON A.PERMISSION = PER.NO JOIN ADMIN_POSITION PO ON A.POSITION = PO.NO WHERE A.ID = #{id} AND A.QUIT_YN = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER
WHERE ${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT NO ,ID ,PWD ,NAME ,BIRTH ,PHONE ,NICK ,EMAIL ,TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,PROFILE_IMG_NAME ,POINT ,DECODE(QUIT_YN, 'N','유지', 'Y','탈퇴') AS QUIT_YN FROM MEMBER
WHERE ${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT M.NO ,M.ID ,M.PWD ,M.NAME ,TO_CHAR(BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTH ,M.PHONE ,M.NICK ,M.EMAIL ,M.ENROLL_DATE ,M.MODIFY_DATE ,M.PROFILE_IMG ,M.POINT ,DECODE(QUIT_YN, 'N','유지', 'Y','탈퇴') AS QUIT_YN ,M.REPORT_CNT ,TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(FINISH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FINISH_DATE FROM MEMBER M FULL JOIN REPORT R ON M.NO = R.BLACKLIST WHERE M.NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT P.MEMBER_NO ,CP.NAME AS HISTORY ,P.CHANGE ,P.ENROLL_DATE FROM POINT P JOIN CATE_POINT CP ON P.HISTORY = CP.NO WHERE P.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY P.ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TEACHER T JOIN MEMBER M ON T.MEMBER_NO = M.NO
M.${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND T.STATUS_YN = 'N'
AND T.CATEGORY IN
#{arr}

SELECT T.NO ,T.MEMBER_NO ,T.CATEGORY AS CLASS_CATE ,T.CAREER ,T.SHORT_INTRO ,T.INTRODUCE ,T.RECORD ,T.ENROLL_DATE ,T.MODIFY_DATE ,T.STATUS_YN ,T.DELETE_YN ,M.ID ,M.EMAIL ,M.NAME ,M.PHONE FROM TEACHER T JOIN MEMBER M ON T.MEMBER_NO = M.NO
M.${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
T.STATUS_YN = 'N'
AND T.CATEGORY IN
#{arr}
ORDER BY T.NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TEACHER WHERE STATUS_YN = 'N' AND DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT T.NO ,T.MEMBER_NO ,T.CATEGORY AS CLASS_CATE ,T.CAREER ,T.SHORT_INTRO ,T.INTRODUCE ,T.RECORD AS CHANGE_NAME2 ,T.ENROLL_DATE ,T.MODIFY_DATE ,T.STATUS_YN ,T.DELETE_YN ,M.ID ,M.EMAIL ,M.NAME ,P.CHANGE_NAME ,M.PHONE FROM TEACHER T JOIN MEMBER M ON T.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN PROFILE_TEACHER_ATTATCH P ON T.NO = P.TEACHER_NO WHERE T.NO = #{no}

SELECT NO ,TEACHER_NO ,CATEGORY ,CLASS_NAME ,CLASS_CONTENT ,RECOMM ,STUDENT_CNT ,PRICE ,ENROLL_DATE ,TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFY_DATE ,DELETE_YN ,CLASS_CNT FROM CLASS WHERE TEACHER_NO = #{no}
mapper.update:
UPDATE TEACHER SET STATUS_YN = 'N' , DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO IN
#{no}
UPDATE TEACHER SET STATUS_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE CLASS SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{cno}
mapper.select: SELECT ID , TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE FROM ADMIN WHERE QUIT_YN = 'N' AND PHONE = #{phone}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ADMIN SET QUIT_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO IN
#{no}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CORPORATE_MEMBER
WHERE ${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND SECTOR IN
#{arr}

SELECT NO ,ID ,PWD ,COMPANY_NAME ,COMPANY_ADDRESS ,DETAIL_ADDRESS ,NAME ,PHONE ,INTRODUCE ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,COMPANY_NUM ,QUIT_YN ,STATUS_YN ,SECTOR ,EMP_NUM ,SALES ,HOMEPAGE ,DELETE_YN FROM CORPORATE_MEMBER
${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND SECTOR IN
#{arr}
ORDER BY NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CORPORATE_MEMBER WHERE STATUS_YN = 'N' AND DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT NO ,ID ,PWD ,COMPANY_NAME ,COMPANY_ADDRESS ,DETAIL_ADDRESS ,NAME ,PHONE ,INTRODUCE ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,COMPANY_NUM ,QUIT_YN ,STATUS_YN ,SECTOR ,EMP_NUM ,SALES ,HOMEPAGE ,DELETE_YN FROM CORPORATE_MEMBER WHERE NO = #{no}

SELECT E.NO ,E.CORP_NO ,J.TYPE AS CATEGORY ,E.TITLE ,E.RESPONSIBILITY ,E.QUALIFICATION ,E.PREFERENTIAL ,E.SALARY ,E.BENEFITS ,E.INTRODUCE ,E.SECTOR ,E.ADDRESS ,E.CAREER ,E.DEADLINE ,E.WISH_CNT ,E.ENROLL_DATE ,TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFY_DATE ,E.DELETE_YN FROM EMPLOYMENT E JOIN JOB_CATE J ON E.CATEGORY = J.NO WHERE CORP_NO = #{no}
mapper.update:
UPDATE MEMBER SET QUIT_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO IN
#{no}

UPDATE CORPORATE_MEMBER SET QUIT_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO IN
#{no}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER B ON R.BLACKLIST = B.NO JOIN MEMBER A ON R.ACCUSOR = A.NO
WHERE ${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT R.NO ,B.ID AS BLACKLIST_ID ,A.ID AS ACCUSOR_ID ,BLACKLIST ,ACCUSOR ,T.TYPE ,R.CATE_NO ,R.BOARD ,TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') AS REPORT_DATE ,R.HANDLE_YN ,TO_CHAR(PROCESS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') AS PROCESS_DATE ,TO_CHAR(FINISH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FINISH_DATE ,M.METHOD FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER B ON R.BLACKLIST = B.NO JOIN MEMBER A ON R.ACCUSOR = A.NO FULL JOIN PROCESS_METHOD M ON R.METHOD = M.NO JOIN REPORT_TYPE T ON R.TYPE = T.NO
WHERE ${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
ORDER BY R.NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE HANDLE_YN = 'N'

SELECT R.NO ,B.ID AS BLACKLIST_ID ,A.ID AS ACCUSOR_ID ,BLACKLIST ,ACCUSOR ,T.TYPE ,R.CATE_NO ,R.BOARD ,TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') AS REPORT_DATE ,R.HANDLE_YN ,TO_CHAR(PROCESS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') AS PROCESS_DATE ,TO_CHAR(FINISH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FINISH_DATE FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER B ON R.BLACKLIST = B.NO JOIN MEMBER A ON R.ACCUSOR = A.NO JOIN REPORT_TYPE T ON R.TYPE = T.NO WHERE R.NO = #{no}
SELECT LABEL , COUNT(*) AS DATA FROM ( SELECT FLOOR((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')- TO_CHAR(BIRTH, 'YYYY')) / 10) * 10 AS LABEL FROM MEMBER ) O GROUP BY LABEL ORDER BY LABEL
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO EMAIL_ATTATCH ( NO ,EMAIL_NO ,FILE_NAME ) VALUES ( GET_EMAIL_ATTATCH_SEQ , #{vo.no}, #{vo.fileName} )
select 1 from dual
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMAIL E JOIN ADMIN A ON A.NO = E.ADMIN_NO
E.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND E.${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND A.${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND E.ADMIN_NO = #{adminNo}

SELECT E.NO ,A.NAME AS ADMIN_NO ,E.TO_ADDRESS ,E.FROM_ADDRESS ,E.TITLE ,E.CONTENT ,E.FILE_YN ,E.ENROLL_DATE ,E.DELETE_YN FROM EMAIL E JOIN ADMIN A ON E.ADMIN_NO = A.NO
E.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND E.${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND A.${category} LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND E.ADMIN_NO = #{adminNo}
ORDER BY E.NO DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE EMAIL SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO IN
#{no}
mapper.select: SELECT E.NO ,A.NAME AS ADMIN_NO ,E.TO_ADDRESS ,E.FROM_ADDRESS ,E.TITLE ,E.CONTENT ,E.FILE_YN ,E.ENROLL_DATE ,E.DELETE_YN FROM EMAIL E JOIN ADMIN A ON E.ADMIN_NO = A.NO WHERE E.NO = #{no}
SELECT NO ,EMAIL_NO ,FILE_NAME ,ENROLL_DATE ,STATUS FROM EMAIL_ATTATCH WHERE EMAIL_NO = #{no}
